name: Polytope
description:
"is nelder-mead horny?"

PHOTOSENSITIVITY WARNING: there might be pulsating and flashing colors. probably not too bad, but just in case...

webgl support recommended (https://get.webgl.org/)

secret one-button mode: use P instead of ZXCV

source code if you like that sort of thing: https://github.com/ubuntor/polytope
